views.markdown:
Added support for arm64e. Now SimpleLSiOS can automatically change the color of clock/weather label.
Animation was improved in iOS 11.
Now ":" has an animation too.
Remove the dot when location service isn't availble.
Fixed the confilt with Nine.(Need to disable/re-enable Nine.)
Added an button to reset the layout of lockscreen.


Fixed the Hide Weather View option problem with Simple mode.

Fixed crashes on iOS 11.3.X.
Fixed over-heating on some devices.
Fixed the layout problem when switch between two clock style.
Now temperature information was added to simple mode.
Now users can hide the weather&clock view.(Settings-SimpleLS-More)
Add an option to move notification center to the top of the screen when users have "Nine" installed.(Settings-SimpleLS-More)
Now you can move the clock and the weather view by long press it, then you can move it around. And notification list view will be moved automatically to adjust the clock&weather view.

Add support for iOS 11.

Fixed some bugs, more stabled. Especially when you have other lockscreen tweaks installed.
Fixed the layout of weather widget.
"Black Font" can change the label of weather widget to black now.
"Move notifications Up" now works with 4.7' & 5.5' devices.
Fixed the layout problem when playing music in lock screen.


Fix some bugs about weather widget.


Fixed the bugs about notification centre and random respring.
Added weather widget to lock screen.
Fix something wrong for 5,5' devices.


Fix the bug of notifications banners.


Thank vitalo for his wonderful icon.

Changed the 12 hour format (09:41 -> 9:41).
Default date format (ddd) replaced by (dd).
Reduced gap betwen clock & notification.
"Bold Text" was added to the "More" menu.
Fix somethings which may cause safemode.


Would you like to buy me a coffee :-) New:
Time & date format can be changed now.
A custom subtitle can be added to lock screen.
Can hide somethings on lock screen now.
A new clock style called "Simple" was added.
Fix some bugs.
Fix issue with media control.
Some tweaks that can hide today or camera page can work with SimpleLS now.
